# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Use the latest language features and syntax supported by the project (C++17/20), including: 
  - `constexpr`
  - `[[nodiscard]]`
  - `std::string_view`
  - structured bindings
  - if-with-initializer
  - `auto`
  - brace initialization

## Code Style
- Use specific formatting rules
- Follow naming conventions
